Corn_leaf_blight_00007.jpg.text: The leaf is green in color with a smooth texture. There are several spots or discolored areas on the leaf, which are brown in color. The leaf has a somewhat oval shape with serrated edges. There are no visible damages like holes, tears, or wilting. The veins on the leaf are visible and are of a lighter green color.
